unnormalised: Hey guys, any updates on Jadeja's knee? Heard it was bad. Also, is Bumrah playing the Asia Cup on 28/08/2024? Saw Kohli limping a bit during practice at Eden Gardens on 10/08/2024 at 17:00 hrs. Hope he's okay! We need him for the match against Pakistan on 15/09/2024. Come on India! Get well soon R. Ashwin!
normalised: Hey guys, any updates on Jadeja's knee? Heard it was bad. Also, is Bumrah playing the Asia Cup on twenty eighth august two thousand and twenty four? Saw Kohli limping a bit during practice at Eden Gardens on tenth august two thousand and twenty four at five zero zero hours. Hope he's okay! We need him for the match against Pakistan on fifteenth september two thousand and twenty four. Come on India! Get well soon R. Ashwin!
